ProductInfo.Features:
Network: Quad-band GSM/GPRS/EDGE:850/900/1800/1900 MHz. HSPA/WCDMA: Europe/Asia: 900/2100 MHz
Platform: Android with HTC Sense. CPU Processing Speed: 600 MHz. Storage: ROM: 512 MB, RAM: 512 MB. Expansion slot: microSD memory card (SD 2.0 compatible).
Camera: 5 megapixel color camera with auto focus and flash. Bluetooth 3.0 with FTP/OPP for file transfer. A2DP for wireless stereo headsets. PBAP for phonebook access from the car kit. Wi-Fi
Connectors: 3.5 mm stereo audio jack, Standard micro-USB (5-pin micro-USB 2.0). Power & Battery: Rechargeable Lithium-ion battery Capacity: 1230 mAh. Talk time: WCDMA: Up to 350 minutes, GSM: Up to 430 minutes
Display: 3.2-inch touch screen. Screen: 81.3 mm (3.2")
ProductInfo.Name: HTC A510E-BLK Wildfire S Unlocked Smartphone with Android OS, 5MP Camera, Touchscreen, Wi-Fi, GPS - No Warranty - Black
